stories.title: In “Our Great National Parks” Obama is too calm about climate crisis
Why Netflix Stock Plummeted 35% This Week

stories.text:
Founders, independent researchers, etc., how do you deal with all the challenges that often come with pursuing your own unique vision?

It's a very big question, but here are some of the things I've struggled with myself, or can imagine happening:

- general lack of guidance and trying to figure out everything yourself

- self-doubt and dealing with criticisms, failures, disappointment

- staying motivated and maintaining progress

- staying true to your vision, while being open-minded to feedback

- navigating big shifts in direction

- feeling isolated/alone because no one else understands your vision
stories.title: Ask HN: How to deal with challenges that come with pursuing your own vision?
Disney found itself in the middle of a culture war

stories.text: Reality Synthesizer utilizes iOS 15.4's addition of the LiDAR sensor to AVFoundation to visualize MIDI notes played on a connected synthesizer. The notes are visualized in augmented reality as the music is played. The demo uses a couple Metal shaders for depth-based visuals.
stories.title: Show HN: Visualize MIDI notes in augmented reality using iOS LiDAR devices
DALL·E 2 and The Origin of Vibe Shifts
